typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [value] FROM OPENJSON(
  (SELECT
        id=a.IdCantiere,
        IdAppalto,
        [Data],
        Descrizione,
        Pioggia,
        OreAutocarro,
        UserId,
        (select IdOre, IdPersona, Ore from dbo.CantiereOre B where B.IdCantiere=A.IdCantiere for JSON AUTO) as Orecantiere
    FROM dbo.Cantiere A FOR JSON PATH)
)',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
